name: Street Rush (skyleen)
description:
Test your skills with Street Rush. Avoid cars and crashing into objects while drifting with 100mph speed. Do donuts to get extra points, but watch out, if you do it too much a bomb will drop and you need to get away from it. Earn coins and buy better looking cars.

If you're pro show us what you're made of in extreme mode. I bet you wont last for long. 1 Life, 1chance, no mistakes.

Compete with others on the leaderboard. Or just pass time while you wait for the dentist, sit on the toilet, or sitting in a jam. Street rush is simple, but fun and addicting. Don't say i didn't warn you. So strap your seat-belt and jump in the chase and show who's the boss.
